items.description:
- Developed SOPs and architected AWS infrastructure and Data Flow Diagrams (DFDs).
- Proficient in AWS services: EC2, IAM, VPC, S3, CloudFront, CloudWatch, CloudFormation, ALB, Lambda, RDS, EKS, ECR, SNS, Security Hub, WAF, CodePipeline, CodeDeploy, and AWS Backup.
- Implemented CI/CD pipelines using GitHub Actions and Jenkins/CodePipeline.
- Managed build and release pipelines for mobile apps in Flutter using GitHub Actions.
- Oversaw dependencies for Apache, PHP, Laravel, Node.js, MySQL, and more.
- Administered Ubuntu OS in a restricted TechM network environment.
- Expertise in Docker containerization, image creation, and hosting.
- Experienced with Amazon EKS for cluster management and app deployment.
- Automated infrastructure provisioning with AWS CloudFormation and Terraform.
- Ensured security with Tenable agents, vulnerability scans, and adherence to best practices.
- Used tools like GitHub code scan, VAPT, and Security Hub for vulnerability assessments.
- Maintained compliance and created deployment guides for multiple clients.
- Collaborated with clients like RR, BCCI, IPL, and FanNxt, and partnered with AWS for TechM Sports Tech Project.
 - Demonstrated leadership, problem-solving, communication, and team collaboration skills.

- Deployment pipelines in Jenkins for continuous deployment across local staging, development, and testing environments.
- Managed GIT version control, enabling code versioning, branching, merging, and reversion, facilitating build support and deployments.
- Developed and executed CI/CD roadmaps within projects using Jenkins, configuring pipelines to streamline development processes.
- Configured Jenkins for automated builds in testing environments and possessed proficiency in Ansible for configuration management.
- Led change requests for production servers, monitored CPI/KPI metrics across environments, and conducted health checks to ensure operational efficiency.
- Demonstrated effective communication and collaboration with stakeholders, showing a quick grasp of new technologies.

- Installation, configuration, maintenance, migration, and administration of SQL Server environments.
- Strong troubleshooting skills for resolving database integrity issues, performance bottlenecks, blocking, deadlocking, and connectivity issues.
- Proficient in backup strategies, restores, recovery models, and database maintenance tasks like shrink operations and DBCC commands.
- Experience in implementing Disaster Recovery (DR) solutions and ensuring High Availability through techniques like Database Mirroring, Replication, and Log Shipping.
- Enforcing SQL Server security measures, managing database authentication modes, user creation, permissions configuration, and role assignment.
- Performance tuning and query optimization using tools like Performance Monitor, SQL Profiler, and other monitoring and troubleshooting utilities.
- Creating and managing Jobs, Alerts, and SQL Mail Agent.
- Handling Change Management requests on production servers, maintaining database integrity, and security through regular communication with cross-functional teams.
Advanced Cloud computing & DevOps || P.G DIPLOMA
BSCIT || SIES College of Commerce & Economics
HSC, SSC || Shree Sanatan Dharam Vidyalaya
